headline: Garmin (GRMN) G700 TXi Selected For XTI Aerospace's Cutting-Edge TriFan 600 Aircraft
summary: The recent announcement of Garmin G700 TXi avionics being selected for XTI Aerospace's TriFan 600 aircraft highlights Garmin (GRMN)'s advancements in aviation technology. This, alongside strong Q2 2025 earnings with sales up to $1,815 million and a share buyback program, provides context for Garmin's 14% share price rise over the last quarter. The introduction of innovative products, such as the Descent™ S1 Buoy and Force® Current, added to the company's positive performance. While broader...

headline: Itron Launches Smart Water Metering Project With Fiji Water Utility
summary: ITRI teams with Pacific Technologies and Fiji's Water Authority to launch the nation's first smart water metering project.

raw.headline: Itron Launches Smart Water Metering Project With Fiji Water Utility

headline: XTI Aerospace Selects Garmin G700 TXi Avionics System for Revolutionary TriFan 600 Aircraft
summary: XTI Aerospace, Inc. (Nasdaq: XTIA) ("XTI"), a pioneer in xVTOL and powered-lift aircraft solutions, announces the selection of the Garmin G700 TXi avionics system for its flagship TriFan 600, the revolutionary xVTOL aircraft for fast, comfortable regional travel.
